text: Peter Crawley (born 4 January 1969) is an English cricketer. He played four first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club in 1992. ==See also== * List of Cambridge University Cricket Club players ==References== ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:English cricketers Category:Cambridge University cricketers Category:People from Newton-le-Willows
title: Peter Crawley (cricketer)
